posts.title: New book by really important author
posts.author: Mike Smith
posts.body: One of the world's most foremost novelists has recently released his magnum opus 'The World'. The excitement in the literary world is palpable.

posts.title: Controversial installation artist Bobby Williams to show at Portland Art Museum
posts.author: Sarah Jones
posts.body: International art-world darling Bobby Williams will show his recent work consisting of a series of found garbage objects at the Portland art Museum this fall. Local audiences will be challenged to decided whether they think it is really art or not.
